storage.js

Summary
storage.js
StorageSingleton for permanent storage of TabView data.
Functions
onReadyCalls callback when Storage is ready for business.
initSets up the object.
wipeCleans out all the stored data, leaving empty objects.
saveTabSaves the data for a single tab.
getTabDataReturns the data object associated with a single tab.
saveGroupSaves the data for a single group, associated with a specific window.
deleteGroupDeletes the data for a single group from the given window.
readGroupDataReturns the data for all groups associated with the given window.
saveGroupsDataSaves the global data for the Groups singleton for the given window.
readGroupsDataReads the global data for the Groups singleton for the given window.
saveUIDataSaves the global data for the UIManager singleton for the given window.
readUIDataReads the global data for the UIManager singleton for the given window.
saveDataGeneric routine for saving data to a window.
readDataGeneric routine for reading data from a window.

Storage

Singleton for permanent storage of TabView data.

Summary
Functions
onReadyCalls callback when Storage is ready for business.
initSets up the object.
wipeCleans out all the stored data, leaving empty objects.
saveTabSaves the data for a single tab.
getTabDataReturns the data object associated with a single tab.
saveGroupSaves the data for a single group, associated with a specific window.
deleteGroupDeletes the data for a single group from the given window.
readGroupDataReturns the data for all groups associated with the given window.
saveGroupsDataSaves the global data for the Groups singleton for the given window.
readGroupsDataReads the global data for the Groups singleton for the given window.
saveUIDataSaves the global data for the UIManager singleton for the given window.
readUIDataReads the global data for the UIManager singleton for the given window.
saveDataGeneric routine for saving data to a window.
readDataGeneric routine for reading data from a window.

Functions

onReady

onReady: function(callback)

Calls callback when Storage is ready for business.  Could be immediately if it’s already ready or later if needed.

init

init: function()

Sets up the object.

wipe

wipe: function()

Cleans out all the stored data, leaving empty objects.

saveTab

saveTab: function(tab,
data)

Saves the data for a single tab.

getTabData

getTabData: function(tab)

Returns the data object associated with a single tab.

saveGroup

saveGroup: function(win,
data)

Saves the data for a single group, associated with a specific window.

deleteGroup

deleteGroup: function(win,
id)

Deletes the data for a single group from the given window.

readGroupData: function(win)

Returns the data for all groups associated with the given window.

data)

Saves the global data for the Groups singleton for the given window.

Reads the global data for the Groups singleton for the given window.

data)

Saves the global data for the UIManager singleton for the given window.

Reads the global data for the UIManager singleton for the given window.

Generic routine for reading data from a window.
